titleStmt.title: Enchiridion, seu, Fasciculus adagiorum selectissimorum, or, A manuall of the choysest adagies, collected out of the most ancient poets and philosophers, neuer before translated into English, with the proper sense and application authore Iohanne Leycester.
titleStmt.author: Leycester, John, b. 1598.

notesStmt.note: Latin and English on facing pages.
Page numbers repeated on facing pages.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
